attributes.action: Reinstate the death penalty for anyone who abuses or murders anyone. Reinstate order and control.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The death penalty should be reinstated on people who abuse, beat up, hurt, or murder people. Regain control as the country has gone mad. The news is filled with deaths and people being abused and nothing is being done.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
